<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add assignments to a role"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/roles/{id}/assignments/add"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds one or more user or group assignments to the specified role

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["assignments"],"properties":{"assignments":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["id","type"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"ID of the user or group being assigned"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["user","group"],"description":"Type of entity being assigned (user or group)"}},"title":"AssignmentInput"},"description":"List of user and group assignments"}},"title":"AssignmentsRequest"},"example":{"assignments":[{"type":"user","id":"7a4b1f8e-5c69-4b60-9232-2b0aaf65ef3c"},{"type":"group","id":"6b1e7b8d-7e19-41eb-8fa2-c0ee5bb67a94"}]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

assignments","value":{"code":"ROL-1014","message":"Empty assignments list","description":"At least one assignment must be provided"}}}}}},"404":{"description":"Role not
